results.title: Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure.
results.text_hl: We investigated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ supplementation on @DISEASE_Uremia @DISEASE_MESH:D014511 @@@uremia@@@ enhanced @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061205 @@@vascular calcification@@@ in apoE(-/-) (@GENE_APOE @GENE_11816 @@@apolipoprotein E@@@ deficient) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (Charles Rivers Laboratories, Wilmington, Massachusetts) with or without superimposed @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Ivanovski O, Szumilak D, Nguyen-Khoa T, Nikolov IG, Joki N, Mothu N, Maizel J, Westenfeld R, Ketteler M, Lacour B, Drüeke TB, Massy ZA. Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure. J Urol. 2008 Apr;179(4):1631-6. PMID: 18295249
citations.BibTeX: @article{18295249, title={Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure.}, author={Ivanovski O and Szumilak D and Nguyen-Khoa T and Nikolov IG and Joki N and Mothu N and Maizel J and Westenfeld R and Ketteler M and Lacour B and Drüeke TB and Massy ZA}, journal={J Urol}, volume={179}, number={4}, pages={1631-6}}

results.title: Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress Effector CCAAT/Enhancer-binding Protein Homologous Protein (CHOP) Regulates Chronic Kidney Disease-Induced Vascular Calcification
results.text_hl: Treatment with a combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@, but not @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone, significantly attenuated both @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@-induced medial and intimal @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061205 @@@vascular calcification@@@ (Figures 2C, 2D, and S1A).

citations.NLM: Miyazaki-Anzai S, Masuda M, Demos-Davies KM, Keenan AL, Saunders SJ, Masuda R, Jablonski K, Cavasin MA, Kendrick J, Chonchol M, McKinsey TA, Levi M, Miyazaki M. Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress Effector CCAAT/Enhancer-binding Protein Homologous Protein (CHOP) Regulates Chronic Kidney Disease-Induced Vascular Calcification J Am Heart Assoc. 2014 Jun 24;3(3):e000949. PMID: 24963104
citations.BibTeX: @article{24963104, title={Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress Effector CCAAT/Enhancer-binding Protein Homologous Protein (CHOP) Regulates Chronic Kidney Disease-Induced Vascular Calcification}, author={Miyazaki-Anzai S and Masuda M and Demos-Davies KM and Keenan AL and Saunders SJ and Masuda R and Jablonski K and Cavasin MA and Kendrick J and Chonchol M and McKinsey TA and Levi M and Miyazaki M}, journal={J Am Heart Assoc}, volume={3}, number={3}, pages={e000949}}

results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Oxidative Stress, NF-kappaB Activation, and Artery Calcification in LDLR-/- Mice Fed with High Fat Diet via Down-regulation of Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha and TNF Receptor 1
results.text_hl: Based on these findings, we further speculate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ may attenuate the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061205 @@@artery calcification and stiffness@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin CP, Huang PH, Lai CF, Chen JW, Lin SJ, Chen JS. Simvastatin Attenuates Oxidative Stress, NF-kappaB Activation, and Artery Calcification in LDLR-/- Mice Fed with High Fat Diet via Down-regulation of Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha and TNF Receptor 1 PLoS One. 2015;10(12):e0143686. PMID: 26625143

results.title: Pseudoxanthoma elasticum and familial hypercholesterolemia: a deleterious combination of cardiovascular risk factors.
results.text_hl: She had severe @DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061205 @@@calcification of the arteries@@@ of the lower limbs.

citations.NLM: Pisciotta L, Tarugi P, Borrini C, Bellocchio A, Fresa R, Guerra D, Quaglino D, Ronchetti I, Calandra S, Bertolini S. Pseudoxanthoma elasticum and familial hypercholesterolemia: a deleterious combination of cardiovascular risk factors. Atherosclerosis. 2010 May;210(1):173-6. PMID: 20018285
